headline: Development Data Challenge weekend  in tweets
text: Please note: this column is put together using Storify, which does not work on our mobile site and apps. If nothing loads below this paragraph, click here to go to Storify itself, or use the desktop version of the site. We'll add tweets below throughout the weekend, and follow up with more detail next week, you can also follow live on twitter using #ddc2012, and see the challenges our readers set us in advance. Please comment below if you'd like to get involved with the weekend, future events, or have any questions or suggestions.
